justification: Mentions B’s desire for stability but ignores zero-RB philosophy, injury aversion, and urgent need for wins. Claims ‘stable floors’ while offering Nick Torres, who isn’t clearly a floor WR. Asking B to give up their lone workhorse RB (Taylor) for a committee RB (Lewis) is unlikely at 1-7. Rationale is a one-liner with no roster, schedule, or role detail, showing limited ToM depth.
